title: Lamorne Morris
itunes:title: Lamorne Morris
itunes:subtitle: Lamorne Morris [New Girl, Woke, Call me Kat, Game Night, BrainRush] talks with Anna about his love for Chicago, learning to improvise, his fear of ex-girlfriends listening to this podcast, team leadership, his Hollywood Video boss who would have sex in th
description:
Lamorne Morris [New Girl, Woke, Call me Kat, Game Night, BrainRush] talks with Anna about his love for Chicago, learning to improvise, his fear of ex-girlfriends listening to this podcast, team leadership, his Hollywood Video boss who would have sex in the lunchroom, Michael Jordan raising your kids, conspiracy theories, prank calls from his mom and more. Anna also pulls out a few cards from her new game DEALBREAKER’S and asks Lamorne what he would or would not accept from a hypothetical romantic partner. Later in the episode, Anna and April offer some unqualified (and qualified) advice to a listener on the topic of improving her relationship and sex life.

Learn more about April and LEVEL by visiting  www.levelconnections.com

Pre-order Dealbreakers now. On sale May 11 wherever books are sold

Learn more about GAPPS and following them online @healthybirths on Instagram and @gappstweets on Twitter.

Dame Dame Products is a woman-owned sex toy company making the next generation of vulva-tested, vulva-approved vibrators. Go to dameproducts.com/ANNA today for 10% off

Maker's Mark Join me in reclaiming 6–7 p.m. as The Happiest Hour so you can do whatever it is that makes you happy. And if that involves a glass of bourbon, remember - Maker’s Mark crafts their  bourbon carefully, and they ask that you enjoy it that way. Maker’s Mark Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whisky, forty-five percent alcohol by volume. Copyright Twenty Twenty-One Maker’s Mark Distillery Incorporated, Loretto, Kentucky.

Please subscribe to Anna Faris is Unqualified on Apple Podcasts and follow us on social media:

Instagram @Unqualified
Twitter @Unqualified
Facebook @Anna Faris is Unqualified
Music by: Mondo Cozmo @mondocozmo
Producers: Michael Barrett, Rob Holysz, Jeph Porter
Researcher: Margot Barrett

Production Services: Rabbit Grin Productions rabbitgrinproductions.com
Distributed by: Simplecast


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
